Ladies, if he:

-pleads guilty to making false statements to Congress
-pleads guilty to violating campaign finance laws & to bank & tax crimes

He’s not your man. He’s former Trump lawyer Michael Cohen.

html: When women control the spacing & the # of children they will have, there is a ripple effect that benefits all of society. Cutting funding to these programs undermines U.S. international development goals, hurts women & girls, and is, quite simply, an ineffective and bad decision.

html: Year after year, we must remind our Republican colleagues about the critical importance of international reproductive health services. And once again, the majority has severely cut funding to these life-saving programs.
text: Year after year, we must remind our Republican colleagues about the critical importance of international reproductive health services. And once again, the majority has severely cut funding to these life-saving programs.

html: I support @RepTimRyan’s amendment to restore funding for bilateral family planning and reproductive health efforts to the FY 2018 level.
text: I support @RepTimRyan’s amendment to restore funding for bilateral family planning and reproductive health efforts to the FY 2018 level.

html: Because the US neither can -- nor should -- provide assistance to every country, our partnership with UNFPA extends our reach to millions more women than we could alone.... Today’s global challenges are enormous. The US must not cut itself off from its most effective partners.
text: Because the US neither can -- nor should -- provide assistance to every country, our partnership with UNFPA extends our reach to millions more women than we could alone.... Today’s global challenges are enormous.  The US must not cut itself off from its most effective partners.

html: UNFPA not only provides family planning services; it leads efforts to eliminate the practice of sex-selection; prevent gender-based violence; and provide safe delivery kits for childbirth.
text: UNFPA not only provides family planning services; it leads efforts to eliminate the practice of sex-selection; prevent gender-based violence; and provide safe delivery kits for childbirth.

html: I support @RepBarbaraLee’s amendment to FY19 SFOPS appropriations bill. UNFPA works in 3x as many countries as USAID, including many places where no other service providers are available.

html: We’re at full committee markup of FY19 SFOPS appropriations bill... I agree with @rosadelauro: @realDonaldTrump’s family separation policy is child abuse.

html: The House majority rejected my amendment to strike the expanded Global Gag Rule as well as the ban on funding for the United Nations Population Fund. Democrats will keep fighting to best serve men, women, and children in need!
text: The House majority rejected my amendment to strike the expanded Global Gag Rule as well as the ban on funding for the United Nations Population Fund. Democrats will keep fighting to best serve men, women, and children in need!

html: .@NitaLowey's amendment "would strike the expanded #GlobalGagRule as well as the ban on @UNFPA funding. Once again, the House bill shortchanges basic #FamilyPlanning and health services." #WeWontGoBack
text: .@NitaLowey's amendment "would strike the expanded #GlobalGagRule as well as the ban on @UNFPA funding. Once again, the House bill shortchanges basic #FamilyPlanning and health services." #WeWontGoBack

html: We cannot, under any circumstance, allow this policy to be codified into law, as it will hit the most vulnerable the hardest, including those who are unable to access services due to stigma, poverty, violence, or HIV status.
text: We cannot, under any circumstance, allow this policy to be codified into law, as it will hit the most vulnerable the hardest, including those who are unable to access services due to stigma, poverty, violence, or HIV status.

html: This destructive policy endangers our most successful global health programs. While we are just beginning to learn the impact of the expanded policy, the alarm bells are already ringing.
text: This destructive policy endangers our most successful global health programs.  While we are just beginning to learn the impact of the expanded policy, the alarm bells are already ringing.

html: In closing, my amend doesnt change long-standing prohibition on funding for abortions. It simply allows aid recipients the ability to use their own resources, within the legal constraints of their countries, as they deem necessary to best serve men, women, and children in need.
text: In closing, my amend doesnt change long-standing prohibition on funding for abortions.  It simply allows aid recipients the ability to use their own resources, within the legal constraints of their countries, as they deem necessary to best serve men, women, and children in need.

html: The lives saved from our work in maternal health, HIV, malaria or other diseases should be a source of pride for every U.S. citizen. Inserting the #GGR into all global health programs will diminish effectiveness of this work & reduce our country’s role as a global health leader.
text: The lives saved from our work in maternal health, HIV, malaria or other diseases should be a source of pride for every U.S. citizen.  Inserting the #GGR into all global health programs will diminish effectiveness of this work & reduce our country’s role as a global health leader.

html: My amendment does not change any of the current provisions in law that restrict the use of family planning funds. It would simply ensure that countries are setting their own health policies – not the United States.
text: My amendment does not change any of the current provisions in law that restrict the use of family planning funds. It would simply ensure that countries are setting their own health policies – not the United States.

html: Under this expanded policy: o Her doctor can’t have a factual convo about her health w/o worrying if even a simple convo would risk entire clinic’s funding. o Her kids’ doctors have to sign onto a policy regarding abortion before discussing handwashing or providing immunizations.
text:
Under this expanded policy:
o Her doctor can’t have a factual convo about her health w/o worrying if even a simple convo would risk entire clinic’s funding.
o Her kids’ doctors have to sign onto a policy regarding abortion before discussing handwashing or providing immunizations.

html: We have seen this in our travels. When I was in Cambodia in 2001, I met a woman, thin as a rail, when she came into a U.S. funded clinic with six or seven malnourished children trailing behind her. And she was noticeably pregnant with her next...
text: We have seen this in our travels.  When I was in Cambodia in 2001, I met a woman, thin as a rail, when she came into a U.S. funded clinic with six or seven malnourished children trailing behind her.  And she was noticeably pregnant with her next...

html: One provider has estimated that approximately 2 million women will be denied reproductive health services as a result of the expanded policy.
text: One provider has estimated that approximately 2 million women will be denied reproductive health services as a result of the expanded policy.

html: We already know the Global Gag Rule, when only applied to family planning programs, hurts the health of men, women, and children. The expansion to all global health without knowing the precise impact is not only bad policy, it jeopardizes lives.
text: We already know the Global Gag Rule, when only applied to family planning programs, hurts the health of men, women, and children. The expansion to all global health without knowing the precise impact is not only bad policy, it jeopardizes lives.

html: Meanwhile, mass confusion about the policy has led to a chilling effect, causing organizations to unnecessarily change or eliminate vital health services.
text: Meanwhile, mass confusion about the policy has led to a chilling effect, causing organizations to unnecessarily change or eliminate vital health services.
